name: tracer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a bullet that leaves a line of flame or smoke behind it when it is fired, so that you can see the direction it has taken: Tracer bullets streaked through the sky. The sky was bright with tracer fire.
SMART Vocabulary: related words and phrases

bullet
